actions.committee: House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct.

official_title: Amending the Code of Official Conduct of the Rules of the House of Representatives to require that contributions to legal defense funds for the benefit of Members shall be treated as campaign contributions.

summary.text: Amends rule XLIII of the Rules of the House of Representatives (relating to the Code of Official Conduct) to require proceeds received by a legal defense fund for the benefit of a Member to be treated as campaign contributions.

titles.title: Amending the Code of Official Conduct of the Rules of the House of Representatives to require that contributions to legal defense funds for the benefit of Members shall be treated as campaign contributions.
